definition: first of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/(used for an unspecified person or thing)/first (in a list, as a party to a contract etc)/letter "A" or roman "I" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/armor plating/shell or carapace/(of the fingers or toes) nail/bladed leather or metal armor (old)/ranking system used in the Imperial examinations (old)/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)/ancient Chinese compass point: 75°
potassium cyanide KCN/same as 氰化鉀|氰化钾

sentences.english: Potassium is particularly important for quality of mandarin oranges.
sentences.chinese: 钾对中同柑的品质的影响尤其突出。

sentences.english: Availability of azolla-potassium for rice was studied with radioactive tracer.
sentences.chinese: 应用示踪技术研究红萍钾对水稻的有效性。

sentences.english: The solution is acid potassium ion aqua.
sentences.chinese: 该溶液是酸性的含钾离子水溶液。

sentences.english: A white or gray mineral of potassium aluminum silicate kalsi2o6.
sentences.chinese: 白榴石一种白色或灰色的钾铝矽酸盐矿物。

sentences.english: The more sodium you consume, the more potassium you need to counteract this effect.
sentences.chinese: 你摄入的钠越多，就需要更多的钾来中和。

sentences.english: Avocados are a good source of potassium, a mineral that helps regulate blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨也富含钾元素，而钾元素则帮助调节血压。

sentences.english: Avocados are a good source of potassium, a mineral that helps regulate blood pressure.
sentences.chinese: 鳄梨也富含钾元素，而钾元素则帮助调节血压。

sentences.english: K2O content and variation reflect the evolution of the rock and K-metasomatism.
sentences.chinese: 钾质高低及变化可反映岩石演化程度和钾交代作用。

sentences.english: Orientation and polarization methods of as-grown KNbO_3 polydomain crystal are described.
sentences.chinese: 描述了生成态铌酸钾多畴晶体的定向和单畴化方法。

sentences.english: Purchase of potassium iodide doesn't require a prescription, Ms. Fox said.
sentences.chinese: 购买的钾碘化物不需要处方，女士狐狸说。

sentences.english: It quickly combusts and soon it disappears into the air.
sentences.chinese: 钾在空气里会剧烈燃烧，很快就会消失。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the concentration and quantity of potassium supplement in hypopotassemia crisis.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨低血钾危象时补钾的浓度和量。

sentences.english: Raisins provide potassium, which your body uses to convert sugar into energy.
sentences.chinese: 葡萄干能供应人体内用于糖转化为能量的钾。

sentences.english: Lanthanide trichlorides display no catalytic effect on the hydrogenation of potassium in presence of naphthalene.
sentences.chinese: 稀土氯化物对金属钾的氢化反应不显示催化作用。

sentences.english: Two benzene rings from two B15C5 molecules are cis orientation with respect to potassium ion.
sentences.chinese: 两个苯并15冠5的苯环相对钾原子呈顺式排列。

sentences.english: This helps the kidneys retain sodium distal to the site of the mutation but at the expense of losing potassium.
sentences.chinese: 这有助于肾脏突变的远端保钠，但会以失钾为代价。
